title: Self Defense
description:
Shauna McGarry, Florian Beijers, Molly Cameron and Marc Abbott share stories about workplace harassment, unhelpful help, psychic art and a guy with a gun.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (The Paradise Bangkok Molam International Band, Shauna McGarry, Florian Beijers, Molly Cameron, Jesse Lawrence, Stars, Marc Abbott, Kevin Allison)
